articleTitle: Juventus dank Ronaldo-Doppelpack vor Einzug ins Cupfinale
articleTitleTranslated: Juventus thanks to Ronaldo double before moving into the cup final
articleContent: Die Turiner feierten dank des Superstars einen 2:1-Erfolg im Semifinal-Hinspiel bei Inter Mailand.
articleContentTranslated: Thanks to the superstar, the Turin team celebrated a 2-1 victory in the semi-final first leg at Inter Milan.
